🥗 2. Diet Plan for Underweight Goal: Calorie surplus with nutrient-dense foods.
🍽️ Daily Sample Meal Plan: Morning (7:00–9:00 AM):
2 boiled eggs
1 banana or mango
2 slices whole wheat bread with peanut butter
A glass of whole milk or a smoothie
Mid-Morning Snack (10:30–11:30 AM):
A handful of nuts (almonds, walnuts)
Yogurt with honey
Lunch (1:00–2:00 PM):
Rice or whole wheat roti
Protein (chicken, fish, tofu, lentils)
Vegetables (spinach, carrots, beans)
Salad with olive oil
Evening Snack (4:00–5:00 PM):
Cheese sandwich or boiled potato
Milkshake or fruit juice
Dinner (7:00–8:30 PM):
Same as lunch, with a focus on protein
Add curd or paneer (if vegetarian)
Before Bed (10:00–11:00 PM):
A glass of milk with almonds or dates

🏋️ 3. Exercise Plan for Underweight Goal: Build lean muscle, not lose more weight.
💪 Weekly Routine: Monday, Wednesday, Friday:
Strength Training (30–40 min):
Bodyweight squats
Push-ups
Dumbbell curls (if available)
Planks
Light Cardio (15 min): brisk walking or cycling
Tuesday, Thursday:
Yoga or Stretching
Light jogging or resistance band workouts
Saturday:
Play a sport (e.g., badminton, swimming, etc.)
Sunday:
Rest or light walkingt
